Remotec ZXT-310US¶

Remotec ZXT-310US, BW8371US, by Remotec, Cert ID: ZC08-15100001¶

Brief information¶

  • Built-in code library enables ZXT-310 works with any z-wave compliant controller
  • ZXT‐310 also supports host‐based library upgrade for 6 AV database

Specification¶

  • IR Operating freq: 445 kHz
  • RF Operating freq: 908.42/868.42/921.42/865.22/869.02/916.02 MHz
  • IR Operating distance: Up to 25 feet sign of line
  • RF Operating distance: Up to 80 feet sign of line
  • Operating temperature: 0~40 oC
  • Power: 5V DC - 100 mA

Inclusion/Exclusion to/from a network¶

  1. Put controller to Inclusion/Exclusion mode
  2. Make sure ZXT-310 switched to Channel 1 (EP1)
  3. Press program button once. Device will be included/excluded to/from zwave network.

Factory reset¶

Press and hold Program button for 10 seconds, LED will flash until reset process completed.

Link in Amazon¶

https://www.amazon.com/Remotec-ZXT-310US-BW8371US-Cert-ZC08-15100001/dp/B016YTTRY0

Configuration description¶

There is no configuration in this device.
